data.text: Kardashian was diagnosed with esophageal cancer in July 2003. He died less than eight weeks later, age 59, on September 30, 2003, and was buried at Inglewood Park Cemetery in Inglewood, California. https://t.co/vGabcD1UZd

"Robert Kardashian, a Lawyer For O. J. Simpson, Dies at 59". The New York Times. October 3, 2003. Retrieved November 22, 2010.
